title: Extremely low fps
body:
So, I have been having a lot of trouble with LoL. The frames are getting very bad and at times are pretty much un-playable. Every other game works fine such as Arma 3 with around 90fps and Rainbow Six with around 250fps+. League I've been getting around 80fps and below in the start of the match and works its way to around 30-60 by end of matches.

**Specs:**

EVGA 980ti sc
i7-5820k
16gb ddr4 3300
EVGA SuperNova 1050 gold
Corsair h100i
2x - vg248qe monitors


**Things I've tried:**

Reinstall the game
Repair files
Redo all drivers
Fresh windows install
Changing monitor cables
Changing settings in-game
Nvidia settings changed

replies.body: I have the same issue and I believe it is tied the the CPU bottle necking your graphics card. I have a GTX 1080 ti. That processor is only clocked at 3.3 ghrtz which isn't amazing and I've noticed my framerates range from 200 to 70 depending on how heavily the processor is being bottle necked because its only running on 2 cores and those cores are clocked low.

It looks like you've hit most of the typical steps we use to help fix [**FPS Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)). Since I don't want to suggest doing anything for a second time, and it sounds like what's causing those frame drops is something very specific, let's go ahead and get you more in-depth help with our tech guys.

Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to help you more there!
